name: Brain Unblock Car Parking
description:
Brain Unblock Car Parking is a challenging and addictive puzzle game. The goal of the game is to get the blocked red car out of some busy parking areas by moving the other automobiles out of the way. Help the red racing car get out of some difficult parking situations and traffic jam.
How to play Unblock Car Parking:
1. Drag the objects to create a gap.
2. Move the red one through the puzzle.
3. Less moves to win more stars.
